ND%26map.layer%5Barrowzoom03%5D%3DFEATURE+POINTS+128299.232112+2313733.97638+EN-
D+END |title=Martin Islands |accessdate=2008-06-10 |publisher=Atlas of
Canada}} are part of the Canadian Arctic Archipelago in the territory of
Nunavut. They are located in western Gulf of Boothia near the Boothia Peninsula.
